convert.description: Converts rebirth coins into prestige coins.

help.footer: why the fuck do you need help with this command

leaderboard.description: Shows leaderboard. Specify a category to get specific leaderboard

profile.description: Shows user's profile. Specify a user to show their profile

rebirth.description: A greater prestige after prestiging, we can call this rebirth.

sell.description: Sell every item from your backpack for coins

stage_info.description: Shows information about the stages of the game
stage_info.footer: warning: this command contains a lot of information

start.description: Register your profile to get started.

upgrade.description: Upgrades your tools. Specify a tool and level to upgrade

userbio.description: Customize your bio. Leave the parameter blank to reset it.
